items.name: The Iron Heart Museum
items.short_description: Dive deep into the epic story of Zouérat's iron ore mining, from ancient techniques to modern operations. Interactive exhibits and geological displays bring the town's lifeblood to light.
items.address: Central District, next to SNIM Headquarters, Zouérat

items.name: Zouérat Star Oasis Camp
items.short_description: Experience the unparalleled beauty of the Sahara night sky at this dedicated stargazing site, featuring telescopes and guided astronomy sessions. Escape the city lights for a celestial spectacle.
items.address: 15km South of Zouérat, Route de Bir Moghrein

items.name: Souk El-Khadra (Green Market)
items.short_description: Discover authentic Mauritanian handicrafts, textiles, and local produce at this vibrant new market. Support local artisans and take home a piece of Zouérat's rich culture.
items.address: Near Grand Mosque, Market District, Zouérat

items.name: Tmeimichatt Oasis Park
items.short_description: A newly developed ecological park surrounding a natural oasis, offering walking trails, picnic spots, and birdwatching opportunities. A green sanctuary in the heart of the desert.

items.name: Iron Giant Viewpoint
items.short_description: Witness the legendary Iron Ore Train, one of the longest and heaviest trains in the world, as it rumbles through the desert. A specially constructed viewpoint provides an unforgettable panorama.
items.address: Route de Choum, 20km West of Zouérat

items.name: The Tents of Timelessness
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in the rich history and traditions of Mauritania's nomadic peoples. This interactive center showcases traditional tents, artifacts, music, and storytelling from the desert.

items.name: Zouérat Sands Fun Park
items.short_description: A modern, desert-themed adventure playground designed for children of all ages, featuring safe climbing structures, slides, and shaded play areas. Perfect for family fun in Zouérat.
items.address: Near City Hall, Residential Area, Zouérat

items.name: The Miners' Path Guided Walk
items.short_description: Join a certified guide on a fascinating walking tour exploring the historical sites of Zouérat's early mining operations and the communities that grew around them. Learn about the tough life of miners.

items.name: Desert Dromedary Adventures
items.short_description: Embark on unforgettable camel treks into the serene Mauritanian desert. Choose from short excursions or overnight camping trips, guided by experienced local nomads.
items.address: North Zouérat, near F'dérik Road junction

items.name: Zouérat Community Arena
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art sports complex featuring indoor basketball courts, football pitches, and a gym. Open to locals and visitors for recreation and friendly competition.
items.address: Adjacent to the new Residential Blocks, Zouérat
